SQL.LOAD: select cp.commission_plan_id, cp.code, cp.description, cp.effective_date, cp.expiration_date, cp.reference, cp.reference_id, d.dealer_id, nvl(comp.company_id, d.company_id ) company_Id, cp.created_by, cp.created_date, cp.modified_by, cp.modified_date from ELP_COMMISSION_PLAN cp left join elp_dealer d on d.dealer_id = cp.reference_id and cp.reference = 'ELP_DEALER' left join elp_company comp on comp.company_id = cp.reference_id and cp.reference = 'ELP_COMPANY' WHERE commission_plan_id = :commission_plan_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT cp.commission_plan_id, d.dealer_name, cp.effective_date effective, cp.expiration_date expiration, cp.code, cp.description, c.code company_code FROM elp_dealer d , elp_commission_plan cp, elp_company c WHERE d.company_id = c.company_id AND d.dealer_id like :dealer_id AND cp.reference_id = d.dealer_id --dynamic_in_clause ORDER BY dealer_name, effective desc, expiration
SQL.MAX_EXPIRATION: select commission_plan_id, to_char(EXPIRATION_DATE, 'DD-Mon-YYYY') EXPIRATION, sq.EXPIRATION_COUNT from elp_commission_plan, (select Max(EXPIRATION_DATE) MAX_EXPIRATION, Count(*) EXPIRATION_COUNT from elp_commission_plan where reference_ID = :dealer_ID0 ) sq where reference_ID = :dealer_ID1 and EXPIRATION_date = MAX_EXPIRATION
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_commission_plan SET code = :code, description = :description, reference = 'ELP_DEALER', reference_id = :dealer_id, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE commission_plan_id = :commission_plan_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_commission_plan ( code, description, reference, reference_id, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, commission_plan_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, 'ELP_DEALER', :dealer_id, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :commission_plan_id )
SQL.CODE_MATCH: SELECT count (cp.code) FROM elp_commission_plan cp WHERE cp.reference_id != :dealer_id and cp.code = :code
